data.title: Sybase: Power Designer

data.text:
2. Sybase Inc. ProductsSybase SQL ServerAdaptive Server EnterpriseAdaptive Server AnywhereSybase IQReplication ServerAvaki Enterprise Information Integration (EII)Unwired OrchestratorPocketBuilderDataWindow .NET, a component that brings the power of the DataWindow to the Microsoft .NET frameworkAfaria, a remote device management solutionAnswers Anywhere, a natural language processing systemEAServerSybase Enterprise PortalIndustry Warehouse StudioPower Designer, a data modeling/UML modeling/business process modeling and XML modeling toolPylonAnywheresolutions, a tool , a PIM and email synchronization tool with Microsoft Exchange and Lotus Notes back-endsRFID manage RFID hardware and integrate RFID data with enterprise systemsSQL Anywhere StudioUnwired Accelerator

3. Sybase, Inc.Creating an Information Edge —Open, cross-platform software solutions that securely deliver information anytime, anywhere

4. Strongest portfolio of information management and enterprise mobility solutions in the market

5. The world’s most critical data in commerce, communications, finance, government and healthcare runs on Sybase

6. ~4,000 employees in 60 countries

7. Profitable and growingSybase is the largest global enterprise software company exclusively focused on managing and mobilizing information, from the data center to the point of action.

8. Sybase Development Tooling StrategyPowerBuilderFamilyWorkSpaceTarget the Eclipse/Java developer community

9. Address broader range of application classes: ability to integrate

10. Service Driven

11. Composite

12. Event Driven

13. Mobile

14. Modeling

15. PowerBuilder for transactional and n-tier

16. PocketBuilder for rich client/smart client mobile applications

17. Evolve towards tighter integrations with .NETPowerDesignerIndependent modeling tool

19. Fully integrated into PB/.NET and WorkSpace4

20. Data ModelingData modeling in software engineering is the process of creating a data model by applying formal data model descriptions using data modeling techniques

21. MetadataData about data is known as metadataIt gives us additional information about the data.It stores data pertaining to the data and also information about the models created.

22. Sybase Power DesignerPower Designer is the industry-leading modeling and metadata management solution for data architecture, information architecture and enterprise architecture.

23. Used by entire technical teamYes! Can be consumed by all IT division.Business AnalystsData AnalystsDevelopersTeam LeadersTesters

30. New Features in PowerDesignerEnhanced Display PreferencesControl over what appears in the symbol, what sectionsMore options – extended collections, etc.Auto-layout – stronger, more appropriate algorithmsMore choices, based on diagram typeHierarchical, Circular, Orthogonal, Organic, Tree, Basic (old…)Generic MatrixBuild a matrix view of any two artifactsControlled by extended model definitionsUser Profiles During Installation – ease configuration in larger installsAfter Installation – customize for organization standards

31. New Features in PowerDesignerData ModelingLogical Data Model, Barker’s Notation, PDM/ILM UpdatesGeneral EnhancementsDisplay Preferences, Auto-layout, Generic Matrices, More…Impact Analysis DiagramsBased on “Lineage” and “Impact” dependenciesEnterprise Architecture ModelingEA Model, Framework, Projects and EA Framework DiagramsEA Framework Editor CompletedImport Visio Models

32. BenefitsMeta data managementGreater agility in IT environmentModel driven managment

33. More Links Download free evaluation softwarewww.sybase.com/powerdesigner
